AUTHOR: ScarletRaven
DESCRIPTION: Tells users the appropriate grammar to use. This comes with three commands, [p]grammar, [p]gignore, [p]gunignore.
INSTALL_MSG:
The bot will correct mistakes such as 'your a butt'. 
Use `[p]grammar` if you don't want ^'s to get deleted. 
 Of course make sure the bot has the `manage_messages` perm
NAME: Grammar
